sentences.sContent: Besides, benevolence can not be measured by the amount of donations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Besides, benevolence can not be measured by the amount of donations.
sentences.sCn: 其次，仁慈之心也不能够用捐献的多少来衡量。

sentences.sContent: Actually, the cruelty/benevolence of the invader is a pretty big factor too. The Qing were eventually accepted in part because they were relatively benevolent toward the population.
sentences.sContent_eng: Actually, the cruelty/benevolence of the invader is a pretty big factor too. The Qing were eventually accepted in part because they were relatively benevolent toward the population.
sentences.sCn: 其实敌人是仁慈还是凶恶也是个很大的因素。清朝最后接受了部分侵略，就是因为他们比起人民显得更亲切一些。

remMethod.val: bene(好) + vol(意志) + ence → 好的意志 → 仁慈

words.tran: 良性的；仁慈的；有益的；和蔼的
